title: A lithograph shows a war veteran, who turned into

content.question: Which of the following best describes the 1936 lithograph (entitled The Hero) by German artist George Grosz?

choices.label: A propaganda poster prepared by the Nazi Party
A protest poster against the atrocities of the atomic bomb
A representation of a Holocaust victim
A post-First World War print expressing antiwar sentiment

content.answer: A post-First World War print expressing antiwar sentiment

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and describe a claim or argument in a text-based or non-text-based source.
